channel.title: jq on Enrico Stahn
channel.description: Recent content in jq on Enrico Stahn

item.title: jq for PHP
item.description: jq is a great tool for processing JSON on the command line. It’s easy to install (e.g. apt-get intall jq) and easy to use. When we started writing tests for our new REST API i wanted to have an easy way to query the returned JSON responses. The end result is a small wrapper around jq. You can find the project on GitHub Since i have revisited our testing strategy and we moved on to using JSON Schema.
